= Useful keybindings in Tmux =

* Create new tab: `C-b c` 
* Rename the tab: `C-b ,`
* Show all tabs: `C-b w`
* Split horizontally `C-b %`
* Split vertically `C-b "`
* Switch between panes: `C-b <arrow>`
* Zoom/unzoom pane: `C-b z`
* Switch to scroll mode: `C-b <PageUp or PageDown>`
* Quit scroll mode: `C-b q`
